sentence.Network_en: She tore off two sections of paper towel and folded them lengthwise.
sentence.Network_cn: 她撕下两格纸巾，然后纵向对折。

sentence.Network_en: Peel the onion and cut it in half lengthwise.
sentence.Network_cn: 剥掉洋葱皮并把它纵向切成两半。

sentence.Network_en: It has guide ways to allow the carriage to slide easily lengthwise.
sentence.Network_cn: 它有导轨便于底座纵向滑行.

entry.def: Lengthwise means the same as lengthways .

example.ex: Peel the onion and cut it in half lengthwise.
example.tran: 剥掉洋葱皮并把它纵向切成两半。

means.word_mean: 1. running or extending in the direction of the length of a thing;
1. in the direction of the length;
